summary: I love the anime Naruto and really love the look of the eyes so I made some! I think im the closest one who made the rinnegan like the one in the anime. Eyes included are Itachi\'s Sharingan, Rinnegan, and the Sharingan.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------
Naruto Anime Eyes - v1.0
-------------------------

Changes
----------------------------------

 v1.0:
-First release, my take on the eyes in naruto, mainly focused on the eyes that I thought could be made better that haven\'t yet like the rinnegan. Eyes included are Itachi\'s Sharingan, Rinnegan, and the Sharingan.

Overview
----------------------------------
I love the anime Naruto and really love the look of the eyes so I made some!

Installation
----------------------------------

Go to the file area where the ,Itachi\'s Sharingan, Rinnegan, and Sharingan are, then pick only one of the files inside the folders and put it at the end of the given texture file path so it looks like this: \\textures\\Actors\\Character\\eyes, then place the eyeblind.dds file there (you can only have one installed at a time!), then put the texture file in to your data file in game and select merge texture files.

Note: The eyes only work for human races (only work for Breton, Imperial, Nord, and Redguard.

Uninstall
----------------------------------

Remove the eyeblind.dds in the textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\ file path.
author: Cis190
